value: L 1 65 Pirrama Rd, Pyrmont, 2009, NSW, Australia

7812 - Motion Picture and Video Tape Production Summary > Paramount Pictures Australia Pty is the Australian subsidiary of the Paramount Pictures Corporation, an international producer and distributor of motion pictures. Paramount Pictures Australia is mainly charged with the Australian marketing and distribution of its parent company's ongoing roster of film releases. It also handles all cinema and DVD distribution for Paramountâ€™s back catalogue. The Australian arm of the corporation was incorporated in 1982. Paramount Pictures Australia is based in the Sydney suburb of Pyrmont, New South Wales.
